data: [{"id":"3c81662d-2db9-43dc-9c36-628bd55a7c75","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":1,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"fasten.py","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"248393f9-852f-48ef-8673-faabd6c5f050","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"File Description","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c1b1fc53-2768-449a-ad6d-29dc2cb0d85b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"fasten.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file defines a FASTEN formatter implementation for Python call graph data. It transforms information produced by a call graph generator into a FASTEN-compliant structure, enabling standardized representation of modules, dependencies, class hierarchies, and call graphs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"01d8cc28-550c-4c93-8920-69a1b1d32c5f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This file serves as the entry point for converting Python static analysis results into artifacts that can be consumed by FASTEN-compatible tools and ecosystems.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b942e79e-8793-4208-a4ff-442ecd594c84","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"8ec558ea-b3cc-4bca-98d9-f8a393128292","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ae3fe9a7-6282-48c8-be01-e6f2ad5783ed","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of this file is to bridge Python code analysis with the FASTEN data model. By normalizing internal and external code entities into FASTEN identifiers, it allows consistent reasoning about software structure, behavior, and dependencies across different projects.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ced9259f-e502-43e8-b21d-370894430fd5","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"a58dddb4-cceb-4f90-9b84-2f97e5e4e129","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Responsibilities","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3d2a1c8b-59eb-4c39-a8fc-e539b48fbba7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Convert call graph generator output into FASTEN-compliant data structures","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4687a2ac-e1bd-467f-a6ea-44df25485855","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Normalize Python modules, namespaces, and functions into FASTEN document","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"08d7a62d-fb14-41e7-9231-46f874ef74fb","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"0eb434b3-3d88-473d-aed3-e97f8b99b857","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"84550957-0fbd-4cb4-bc10-344bcc85f6ed","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This file focuses exclusively on formatting and transformation logic. It does not perform static analysis itself but relies on upstream generators to provide code structure, call edges, and dependency information.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"93f6c650-203c-4cf7-8411-6e447070fa1e","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"03b9c09d-bf37-4c76-a100-e309f97ff571","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Context","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"97d0f8d8-2cef-44f6-9235-6a9daeceb36d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"fasten.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file is used within the Jarvis formatting pipeline to export Python analysis results into the FASTEN schema. It enables interoperability with external analysis platforms and supports large-scale software ecosystem analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8deb05bb-4ef7-4fea-a4d7-d0dd74e63b60","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"7492c7c8-7d79-48c3-9341-7dc7dc79bbe0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
